scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Th Audio recordings series (dated 1940-2009, undated) contains sound recordings of perfomances by Byron F. Romanowitz throughout his musical career. Group performances include Romanowitz playing with the Charles Blair band, Men of Note, the Dave Parry Orchestra, and others. Recordings are from a wide number of locations, such as the Narcotics Farm and the Coach House Lounge, both in Lexington, Kentucky.
